settlement.name: Settlement
settlement.reputation: Whilst it controls this Territory, the gang adds +1 to its Reputation.

income.effect: Generate an additional 10 credits for each Dome Runner recruited by the gang.

rogue_doc_shop.name: Rogue Doc Shop
rogue_doc_shop.fixed_recruit: Whilst it controls this Territory, the gang may add one Rogue Doc to its roster for free.

promethium_cache.name: Promethium Cache
promethium_cache.fixed_gear: Whilst it controls this Territory, three fighters in the gang gain Incendiary Charges. Nil credit cost and nil gang rating impact.
promethium_cache.battle_special_rules: All fighters in the gang may re-roll Ammo tests for any weapon that has the Blaze trait.

wastes.name: Wastes
wastes.scenario_selection_special_rules: If challenged in the Occupation phase, the gang may choose the Territory at stake in the battle, even though it would normally be chosen by the challenger. If challenged in the Takeover phase for a Territory the gang already controls, make an Intelligence test for the gang Leader. If the test is passed, the player of the gang may choose to play the Ambush scenario instead of rolling. They are automatically the attacker.

sludge_sea.name: Sludge Sea
sludge_sea.fixed_gear: Whilst it controls this Territory, three fighters in the gang gain Choke Gas Grenades. Nil credit cost and nil gang rating impact.

workshop.name: Workshop
workshop.fixed_recruit: Whilst it controls this Territory, the gang may add one Ammo-jack to its roster for free.

income.count_message:

event.text:
⚠️ DISASTER! Duplicates rolled -> Cave in!
Nil income from this territory AND a random fighter suffers a lasting injury.

refuse_drift.name: Refuse Drift (Cawdor)

event.text:
⚠️ DISASTER! Duplicates rolled -> Attacked by a waste-lurker!
Keep the income from this territory BUT a random fighter must miss the next battle.

refuse_drift.reputation_cawdor: Whilst it controls this Territory, the gang adds +1 to its Reputation.

corpse_farm.name: Corpse Farm (Cawdor)

income.count_message:
How many bodies do you have?

That is, (approximately) how many fighters were deleted from either your or your opponents gang rosters' during the Update Roster post battle step over the last month?

income_cawdor.count_message:
How many corpses do you have for the grinders?

That is, (approximately) how many fighters were deleted from either your or your opponents gang rosters' during the Update Roster post battle step over the last month?

For House Cawdor this value will be doubled.

corpse_farm.reputation_cawdor: Whilst it controls this Territory, the gang adds +1 to its Reputation.

bone_shrine.name: Bone Shrine (Cawdor)
bone_shrine.reputation_cawdor: Whilst it controls this Territory, the gang adds +1 to its Reputation.

drinking_hole.name: Drinking Hole (Delaque)
drinking_hole.battle_special_rules: Whilst it controls this Territory, any fighter in the gang may re-roll any failed Cool tests. If a fighter uses this option, place a marker on their card to show that they have hit the bottle. While a fighter has at least one marker from this territory, they suffer a -1 modifier to hit rolls for the rest of the battle.
drinking_hole.battle_special_rules_delaque: The gang that controls this Territory may nominate three enemy fighters at the start of the battle, and place an Intoxicated marker on each fighter’s card to show that their drink was spiked. The marked fighters suffer a -1 penalty to all tests and checks for the duration of the battle.
drinking_hole.reputation: Whilst it controls this Territory, the gang adds +1 to its Reputation.
drinking_hole.reputation_delaque: Whilst it controls this Territory, the gang adds +2 to its Reputation.

gambling_den.name: Gambling Den (Delaque)
gambling_den.reputation: Whilst it controls this Territory, the gang adds +1 to its Reputation.
gambling_den.battle_special_rules_delaque: The gang that controls this Territory may nominate a single enemy fighter at the start of the battle before the first roll for Priority. The gang have called in the fighter’s debt marker, and in return for keeping all of their limbs intact, the fighter agrees to take no part in the coming battle. The nominated fighter misses the battle.
gambling_den.reputation_delaque: Whilst it controls this Territory, the gang adds +2 to its Reputation.
